item.title: Flight Management Computer Systems (FMCS includes Thrust Management Function) – Navigation Databases

remarks.para: May be out of currency provided:

numlitem.para: Current Aeronautical Charts are used to verify Navigation Fixes prior to dispatch,
Procedures are established and used to verify status and suitability of Navigation Facilities used to define route of flight, and
Approach Navigation Radios are manually tuned and identified.
Enter flight plan into FMCS (waypoints, etc.) using standard FMCS procedures.
Cross check FMCS waypoints using current flight crew navigation charts.
Manually tune and identify approach navigation radios.
Modify the ATC flight plan filing suffix to the appropriate code.
FMS RNAV/RNP approaches and departures are prohibited.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "LEFT or RIGHT FMCS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
